channel.title: Hey guys quick question please and thank you
channel.description: Hey , im having a problem with my server, I can Run it and go on it and play and code , but no body else can logg in, i use no-ip.com and dont need to portforwar, just that i had my server going for like 2 months but now nobody can connect also do i check the boxes or uncheck them.... Thank you very much :) [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/34dpydj.jpg[/img]

item.title: Hey guys quick question please and thank you
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

[quote=“vic 08, post:6, topic:237252”][quote author=tonypker13 link=topic=313260.msg2494272#msg2494272 date=1224306661]

KK man Thanks, My problem with portforwarding is ,
When i use say utorrent, or such, i go control panel, network connection, left click on local connections and go to properties, click on internet protocal, then to its properties, and fill all that out correctly but then i go open a internet and type my ip or default ip and nothing comes up, help?

Have you followed a utorrent tutorial?
[/quote]

Utorrent is stupid. If you want a private server, learn to port forward. It’s a simple process… Otherwise you shouldn’t have a server if you can’t do that. That’s the way I see it. :|[/quote]
I do portforward. I’m not an idiot lol. But, If you dont have a router, Utorrent is the way to go. because as we ALL know, Hamachi fails.

Read full topic
item.source: Hey guys quick question please and thank you

item.title: Hey guys quick question please and thank you
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:5, topic:237252”][quote author=cj_howat@hotmail.com link=topic=313260.msg2494260#msg2494260 date=1224306162]
KK man Thanks, My problem with portforwarding is ,
When i use say utorrent, or such, i go control panel, network connection, left click on local connections and go to properties, click on internet protocal, then to its properties, and fill all that out correctly but then i go open a internet and type my ip or default ip and nothing comes up, help?

[/quote]
Have you followed a utorrent tutorial?[/quote]

Utorrent is stupid. If you want a private server, learn to port forward. It’s a simple process… Otherwise you shouldn’t have a server if you can’t do that. That’s the way I see it.

Read full topic

item.title: Hey guys quick question please and thank you
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

hah bah gee:

Only have one checked, whichever you want to be hosted…

Very un true…
You can host more than one…
I’ll answer your question again. I used to be bale to have people log on without portforwarding. That changed.
you MUST portforward or use hamachi now.

Read full topic
